description: T1 Eucalyptus & T2 Cherry: General prune and crown lift by approx 3 metres.  T12  Plane: General prune and crown lift to 8 metres on south side and reduce property side back to boundary wall.  T15 & T16 Ash: General prune and crown lift to 3 metres and remove large limb over boundary wall.  T17 Lime: General prune and thinn 20%, raise crown to 3 metres.  T18 Cherry: General prune and raise crown over path by 2 metres.  T19 Plane & T20 Maple: General prune and crown lift to 8 metres.  T22, T23,T24, T25 &T26 - Planes: General prune and crown lift to 8 metres by selective removal of low limbs.  T28 Lime, T30 Lime, T76 Ash, T79 Ash: Supressed, fell to below ground.  T29 Plane: General prune and reduce west side to allow light and raise crown to 8 metres. T31 Plane: General prune and reduce east side to allow light, remove one low branch over path.  T32  Lime: Crown lift to first crown break.  T33 & T34 Planes: General prune and crown lift over path to 8 metres.  T41 & T98 Oak, T44 Taxodium, T97, T112, T113  Ash: Remove d/w.  T42 & T43 Oaks: Remove d/w and crown raise.  T45, T50 Oak: Crown raise to 3 metres.  T48 - Lime: Crown raise to first break.  T51 Plane: General prune and thin 20%.  Reduce back from Oak tree and raise canopy.  T52 Acer: General prune.  T53 Fig: General prune and remove two low limbs over path causing possible accidents.  T74 & T75 Oaks: Remove d/w and raise over path.  T78 Oak: Dead top, fell to below ground. T83 Ash: General prune and cut back building.  T87 Plane: Crown raise over sign and gate. T99, T106 Planes: General prune and crown raise 8 metres.  T110 Plane: General prune & reduce over Oak.  T114, T128, T130 Ash & T131 Oak: Fell below ground.   T117 Oak: Remove deadwood, crown raise to 4 metres.  T123 Plane: General prune, crown lift over road and street light.
